name: lexartlabs-backend
description: Desafio tecnico para vaga fullstack javascript jr

scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.predev: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.test:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all

author: Cesar Holanda
